Articles.Content:
> 
> Lol, I just finally found this.
> I have a good idea for the habitation, but I think I might want to wait for Unity 5.
> 
> I have a slow and laggy mac.
> 
> DMSP out.
> 
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> Oh, my Orion is complete.
> 
> Photos as soon as I can get Imgur working.
> 
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> I also found a bunch of Constellation Animations/Videos.
>

Yup, I've been watching those videos for a while for inspiration. In fact I intend to recreate that last video in full.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> And that is why I did the simpler Altair version.
> Oh and no pics yet, but 6 man Orion is buildt.

Cool! I'm happy to have a three man Orion and just do two launches. I think making a larger crew capacity always ruins the look of the orbiter.

[![screenshot3341_zpsnxszc7uw.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot3341_zpsnxszc7uw.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot3341_zpsnxszc7uw.png.html)

[![screenshot3323_zpsxhqjw1yo.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot3323_zpsxhqjw1yo.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot3323_zpsxhqjw1yo.png.html)

> 
> http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot3341_zpsnxszc7uw.png.html[http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot3341_zpsnxszc7uw.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot3341_zpsnxszc7uw.png)
> http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot3323_zpsxhqjw1yo.png.html[http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot3323_zpsxhqjw1yo.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot3323_zpsxhqjw1yo.png)

That first one is part of the cargo versions isn't it? I think it's part of the Moon base parts.

> 
> Yup, I've been watching those videos for a while for inspiration. In fact I intend to recreate that last video in full.

I will too. I'm also doing the moon missions and the moon outpost.

> 
> Cool! I'm happy to have a three man Orion and just do two launches. I think making a larger crew capacity always ruins the look of the orbiter.

Yup. In fact, I'm designing my mission around having 3 people. It makes it easier for the SPR rover, Altair, etc.

> 
> Yup. In fact, I'm designing my mission around having 3 people. It makes it easier for the SPR rover, Altair, etc.

Three Kerbals for the whole mission?

> 
> Three Kerbals for the whole mission?

Possibly. That may change, but I want to make sure I'm not burdened by having to have extra crew capacity. The crew lander can hold a max of 4 I think, and the SPR 3. I mostly have the current limit for the MAV, but if I can make it have 4 or more then I'll see.

> Possibly. That may change, but I want to make sure I'm not burdened by having to have extra crew capacity. The crew lander can hold a max of 4 I think, and the SPR 3. I mostly have the current limit for the MAV, but if I can make it have 4 or more then I'll see.

Ok. There should be two SPRs if you can fit them in. I have toyed with the idea of 4 Kerbals instead of 6. As my hab module only holds 4.
I do have two SPRs, at least I plan to. One for each lander, right?

> 
> I do have two SPRs, at least I plan to. One for each lander, right?

Yeah thats it. One per lander.

Alright, I just made an Ares I and an Orion. Photos of the first mission will be soon, the Orion has a lot of Delta V. Too much actually.

DMSP

> 
> Alright, I just made an Ares I and an Orion. Photos of the first mission will be soon, the Orion has a lot of Delta V. Too much actually.
> DMSP

Kewl! What pics are you guys basing your Ares v on?

Using this one to get a good sense of scale for the two launchers.

![Ares-I_Ares-V_(Feb_2008).jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/6/6e/Ares-I_Ares-V_(Feb_2008).jpg)

> 
> As this has never flown, both are 'correct'. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Different versions of it, same craft.
The Second mission for my Orion is rescue a crew of 3 stuck in a Nautalis-X Replica in a Inclined Elliptical Munar Orbit. That's the last test before I finish the Orion and Ares I.
Is it bad I want to make a human mech suit for kerbals for added realism?

> 
> Is it bad I want to make a human mech suit for kerbals for added realism?

Lol. Launching the Orion. Time to save some crew (It can be unmanned).
Almost done Ares 1. Doing a static fire for the Orion because I had an overheating accident a while back, then I need to mount Orion on top and do the LAS.

So, I'm about to dock, when I realize something.

A) An Ares I got me all the way to the Mun

![B)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_cool.png) I forgot Booster 'chutes

C) The Orion has no RCS

I'll continue to save the crew, but I need to do some revisions.
DMSP, can you show us your Orion/Ares I?

Ok, It's uploaded but Imgur isn't working! Dangit!

I'll be back ASAP!

- - - Updated - - -

Here it is!

![H8BeTWW.png](http://i.imgur.com/H8BeTWW.png)![yzG2vCz.png](http://i.imgur.com/yzG2vCz.png)![Rz03B9F.png](http://i.imgur.com/Rz03B9F.png)![iQBWLL0.png](http://i.imgur.com/iQBWLL0.png)![5qvPHV1.png](http://i.imgur.com/5qvPHV1.png)

Honestly, this is one of the best ships I have ever made.

Good job dude! I think we have to accept all out Orion will look the same!

Lookin' good, DMSP! My Ares 1 kept shaking itself to death, I just discovered it was the mono prop tanks in the Orion clipping.

Edit: Hmm. That didn't totally fix it.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-06T19:42:42Z" title="06/06/2015 07:42  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 6, 2015</time> by Zucal**

AHH!

I forgot the Mono again!

Thanks for reminding me, and good luck!

> 
> Good job dude! I think we have to accept all out Orion will look the same!

That's my worst fear, we'll present our recreations and find out they all are almost identical ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
